article_title: KCKCC to consolidate Leavenworth classes at Pioneer Career Center
article_text:
In other business

The Leavenworth Board of Education:

• Received an update about a lawsuit concerning the track at the Leavenworth High Schoo...

article_metadata.description: Kansas City Kansas Community College will be moving its  downtown Leavenworth campus to the new Pioneer Career Center.
article_metadata.author: John Richmeier jrichmeier@leavenworthtimes.com
